text: i would have given this place 35 stars since its quite expensive but i was only impressed by one dish out of several however if you like avocado the avocado train roll is amazing with lots of avocado and a tasty crabavocado side

i really wanted to give this place 35 stars since its pretty expensive and i was only impressed by 1 dish of many that we ordered if you like avocado order the avocado train rollits pretty awesome and has a ton of avocado and a side of crabavocado thats pretty tasty

i bought a groupon for here when a few gfs and i were going to meet for lunch im glad i had it because i dont find it worth paying full price for what they offer or for their customer service nni got a caesar wrap a sunrise smoothie and a kids pizza meal with an extra kid smoothie the girl behind the counter couldnt answer any of my questions when it came to the smoothies i asked a simple question too like whats the different in supercharged ones vs indulgent she just said i dont know okay thanks super helpful then they forgot the extra kids smoothie and when i asked about it she said hold on yet no one ever brought it out and after my meal asked to be refunded nnill only go back to use my last two vouchers and will probably only get smoothies and avoid the food i did notice they had a good happy hour deal on smoothies so if i did visit again without a groupon would probably be during that special
in summary the reviewer believes that sams town is neither the best nor the worst place and it caters to locals among the casinos on boulder highway the reviewer prefers sams town the most
its a small place family owned and operated  clean and great service

my first time at this place was the worst experience ever i waited for 16 minutes just to get a chicken taco and some chips and when i finally got it there was a piece of metal inside the chicken was cold and looked weird because of this i will never go back there again because its not clean and the food is awful
the okay store currently has many empty shelves making it a helpful reference when contrasting with other asian supermarkets im thinking of going to another store

i ordered a desk and small cabinet online and was told i could pick them up in two days when i went to pick up my items it took them 15 minutes to locate my furniture the box for the smaller cabinet was severely damaged while the desk box appeared fine when i assembled both pieces at home i found that both were damaged

horrible customer service  came here for an alignment and because they though it would take more than an hour they wanted me to return tomorrow i understand that it might take them 1020 mins after their operating hours but come on go the extra mile a bit for your customer horrible customer service

my first encounter at that place was horrible they took 16 minutes to bring me a chicken taco and chips which were both unpleasant and included a metal piece i wont be revisiting due to the unclean environment and inadequate food quality

in summary sams town is not the best nor the worst casino it is a local hotel that primarily attracts residents and rodeo visitors out of all the establishments on boulder highway the author prefers this casino the most
i was utterly disappointed by my experience at this location in las veg

this establishment is horrible  a single roll will set you back nearly 17 and the quality is no better than what youd find at vons youll find superior sushi at a convenience store so avoid this place at all costs
this location is dreadful a single roll costs nearly 17 with the same substandard quality youd find at vons you can find superior sushi at a convenience store so steer clear of this place
the burger was exceptional while the fries and shake were mediocre yet because the establishment is famous for its burgers i would return solely for that reason
i gave this place a twostar rating because i left there around 20 minutes ago and i havent thrown up yet but the pho is really bad especially considering its price

seeing the affiliation with bobby flay immediately sparked my interest but bobbys burger palace just barely lived up to its namesake although the prices were reasonable and the ingredients tasted fresh the burger was not anything extraordinary nnmy boyfriend had the vegas burger which was definitely more unique with red chilies and bbq chips that gave an extra crunch i ordered the la burger with chicken breast which was topped off with guacamole and the usual fixings the chicken was cooked really well but the cheddar cheese reminded me of sliced grocery store cheese somehow the bun also got extremely soggy on the bottom so i was holding onto mush by the end of my burger overall the burgers were satisfying but nothing particularly special we also ordered the half sweet potato fries and half regular fries which came with great dipping sauces chipotle mayo and horseradish sauce they also had a great array of other sauces for your burger or fries including a chipotle ketchup and jalapeu00f1o sauce nnif youre looking for a relatively cheap and quick bite on the strip bobbys burger palace can tide you over for a little bit but i would recommend checking out other more noteworthy spots when youre in a city filled with amazing food

awful client service went in for a wheel alignment and was asked to return the next day because it could take more than an hour while i comprehend the time constraint it would have been nice if they went the extra mile for the customer horrendous customer service

steiners lets chat you provide food and permit cigarette smoking but cigars cross the line for nonsmokers however theres no difference between them  both have an odor cigarette smoke adheres to everything hair clothes hands and especially the room in contrast i can smoke a cigar indoors and an hour later theres no scent please a reply or a yelp post would be appreciated

terrible customer support  visited for a wheel alignment but they suggested coming back tomorrow since it might take over an hour i understand the time frame but why not put in extra effort for customers abysmal service

i am usually open to giving a company a second chance however my second visit was even more unsatisfactory than the first the manicure and pedicure i received were done by two individuals who were incredibly rude it would be wise to save your time and money and go to a different spa to have a pleasant experience as you may not have a good time here

i ordered a variety of dips and appetizers and the crab dip with pita chips were incredible but the guacamole was disappointing it had a processed taste and wasnt fresh ive had the fish tacos with a fruity drink before and they were amazing despite that the atmosphere and food overall are great

steiners could we discuss something while you provide food and permit cigarette smoking which can be offensive to nonsmokers cigars are an even bigger issue the truth is both have a smell that sticks to hair clothes hands and the room yet after smoking a cigar indoors for an hour theres no lingering odor please respond or post on
the place is small owned and managed by a family wellmaintained and offers great customer service
a gorgeously designed casino with intricate embellishments and sculptures although they took more money from me than i did from them my gambling experience here was just average

a local casino offers a more laidback gaming experience without the usual flashing lights and loud noises the entrance features a subway and an ice cream parlor making it feel quite normal and not fancy recently a wwe summer slam ppv event was screened in the tournament room with a 5 cover charge including concessions like hot dogs nachos and two beers the food was decent prices were reasonable and seating was plentiful and wellplaced some attendees mentioned reserved seats but good visibility and hearing were experienced even from seats 13 rows back

the movie theaters at sams town are praised for being nice and wellmaintained with low crowds making them ideal for solo moviegoers the casino also features sheplers a great place for western wear in las vegas the reviewer is wary of the restaurants due to experiencing an upset stomach after eating at tgi fridays but notes that willy joses offers bottomless margaritas

ordered a few different dips and appetizers  the crab dip with pita chips were amazing but the guacamole was less than impressive  it tasted like processed guacnothing fresh about it  ive had the fish tacos with a fruity drink in the past and they were delicious  great atmosphere and food overall

we had lunch at this place on a weekday and while the food was passable the service was so poor that it made the experience quite unpleasant we gave it 2 stars because we had to wait almost half an hour for two sandwiches and two smoothies in a nearly empty restaurant if youre okay with repeating your order and having them mess it up you could give this place a try however since we dont have much time for lunch during workdays we wont be coming back

the casino is a fantastic local spot for more lowkey gaming without the usual bright flashing lights and loud obnoxious noises associated with casinos it has a subway and an ice cream parlor at the entrance giving it a normal and nonfancy vibe

hey steiners lets chat you serve food and allow smoking cigarettes but cigars bother nonsmokers both smell and cigarettes linger on hair clothes hands and rooms after smoking a cigar indoors for an hour theres no smell can you reply or post on yelp

i was excited to finally try lil brown sugar cupcakes after reading the reviews my only disappointment was i did not go sooner that day nnwe arrived in the afternoon and the display case was pretty scarce a lady greeted us owner and explained that she had much of her supply sell out that morning of course my first thought is it must be good she still had some red velvets strawberry lemonades and one lonely triple chocolate cupcake left we request one of each except the red velvet other items there were chocolate chip cookies gooey bars and brownies nnhow did the cupcakes taste amazing i cant remember the last cupcake that was as moist and tasteful im one of those cupcake eaters who only like a tiny bit of frosting however this frosting was great not overly sweet and overpowering she told us the strawberry lemonade was her most popular and now i can see why what was i thinking just getting one nnill definitely be back to try her other flavors including the red velvet even maybe for her gooey bar which she let us samplenni highly recommend giving lil brown sugar a visit next time you want an amazing cupcake

guy savoy established the benchmark for highquality dining and our dinner the previous night was exceptional the cuisine was truly outstanding particularly the lobster foie gras and artichoke truffe soup the plating was also visually stunning with the food undeniably being the highlight of the meal

this place is really bad the sushi which costs almost 17 is no better in quality than the ones youd get at vons you can actually find better sushi at a convenience store so its best to avoid this place

this review focuses on various aspects of the casino such as the movie theaters a few stores and the fact that the reviewer has been a regular since childhood sams town has a long history including an album named after it the casino is wellsuited for locals and cowboys and it has a western theme however the reviewer feels that it has declined in recent years

requested a variety of dips and appetizers the crab dip accompanied by pita chips exceeded expectations but the guacamole was underwhelming having a processed taste and lacking in fresh ingredients on a previous occasion the fish tacos paired with a fruity beverage were delightful the ambiance and food in general are commendable

after being enticed into a contract with a scam company who took my money and failed to deliver i found my credit was erroneously marred this company had been barred from half of the us by state attorney generals for disreputable business dealings however i couldnt get their bogus collection claims off my credit report scott coached me from start to finish and eventually guided me to seek legal support the attorney provided the extra push to get a letter of deletion which has cleared my credit report of all derogatory information scott gave me the guidance and support to keep going and prevail against the credit demons

my initial experience at the establishment was quite terrible as it took an extended period of 16 minutes to receive a chicken taco and chips which were both unappetizing and had a metal fragment i refuse to return due to the unsanitary conditions and inferior food
the association with bobby flay initially attracted me to bobbys burger palace but the restaurant only marginally met my expectations the prices were reasonable and the
very beutiful casino filled with ornate decorations and statues they won more from me than i did from them but other than that my gambling experience here was mediocre

i would have liked the delicious stuffed meat pie to have more sauce but maybe thats just me being a bit saucy ill definitely come back next time for a regular pie and ill make sure to sit closer to the ovens in the warmer part of the dining area

a budgetfriendly eatery for breakfast with the added bonus of being able to bring your dog along my favorite aspect is that your furry friend can enjoy the patio with you the breakfast menu was straightforward but its not necessarily a drawback i opted for a small stack of whole wheat pancakes and a side of hashbrowns while my date had cinnamon challah french toast the portion size was perfect  i could finish all three pancakes without wasting food the hashbrowns were crispy and wellseasoned as for the french toast it was a little dry but syrup

my initial experience at this establishment was nothing short of dreadful it took an agonizing 16 minutes to receive a single chicken taco and some chips to make matters worse the taco contained a piece of metal the chicken was cold and appeared unusual consequently i will never set foot in that place again due to its unhygienic conditions and substandard food

the worst experience ever my first time going was not fun it literally took 16 minutes for one chicken taco and chips when i finally got the taco it had a piece of metal in it the chicken was cold and looked weird i will never go there because its not clean and the food suck
the establishment is tiny run by a family and offers tidy surroundings and excellent service

i had a terrible experience at this hotel i prepaid for a onenight stay for my friends 50th birthday but she got sick and we had to cancel when i called the hotel to ask if we could change the date they refused the staff was unhelpful and the hotel was mostly empty despite being told it was fully committed the room was far from the main areas and i felt uncomfortable as a solo female traveler the food was good but expensive and the coffee machine required additional payment for the coffee i wont be returning or recommending this hotel

i bought a groupon for this place when a few friends and i planned to have lunch im glad i had the groupon because i dont think their offerings and customer service are worth paying full price for i got a caesar wrap a sunrise smoothie and a kids pizza meal with an extra kid smoothie the girl behind the counter couldnt answer any of my questions about the smoothies i asked a simple question like the difference between supercharged ones and indulgent ones and she just said she didnt know not very helpful they also forgot the extra kids smoothie and when i asked about it the staff member said theyd bring it but no one ever did after my meal i asked for a refund but no one brought it out ill only go back to use my last two vouchers and will probably just get smoothies and avoid the food i noticed they have a good happy hour deal on smoothies so if i visit again without a groupon id probably go during that special

following an unfortunate incident where i was tricked into signing a contract with a fraudulent company that stole my money and didnt deliver the promised service i discovered that my credit had been incorrectly tarnished this particular company had already been banned from operating in half of the us due to their shady business practices regardless i was unable to get their illegitimate collection claims removed from my credit report scott played an integral role in guiding me through the entire process and eventually advised me to seek legal support the attorney provided the necessary boost to secure a letter of deletion which ultimately cleared my credit report of any negative information scotts guidance and support gave me the strength to continue fighting and ultimately triumph over the credit demons

i really enjoy the delicious food and the ambiance and the decor is fantastic i especially loved the steamed bbq pork buns and the bbq platter which had duck pork and chicken

this review is based on a few things the casino itself the movie theaters a few stores and it is based off me having been a regular of this casino since i was a small childnnsams town has been around for a long time and even has an album named after it if you dont know the artist just look it up its a good ol western themed place plus it is for locals and cowboys who come in for the rodeo on that level the casino is probably deserving of 3 stars but i think its gone down hill in the past couple yearsnnhere are some good things the movie theaters are actually quite nice and well kept theyre hardly ever really busy which make them a good place to go if you want to see a movie by yourselfnnsams town also has sheplers which is a great place to find western wear in las vegasnni am weary of the restaurants here as i experienced an upset tummy after eating at the tgi fridays the mexican place here is called willy  joses and has a bottomless margaritas deal going on right now  but i have yet to indulgennits not the best place nor is it the worst it is a locals hotel and out of all the places on boulder highway i like this casino the best

during a weekday lunch visit the food wasnt terrible but the service was disappointing leading to a 2star rating we waited nearly half an hour for two sandwiches and two smoothies in an empty establishment if youre willing to repeat your order three times and deal with mixups you might consider trying this place due to limited time for lunch during workdays we wont be returning

awful customer service i came here for an alignment and they wanted me to come back the next day since it would take over an hour while i understand it might take 1020 minutes past their operating hours it would be nice if they went the extra mile for their customers horrible customer service

terrible customer experience arrived for an alignment and was told to return the following day due to the service taking over an hour although i comprehend it could take 1020 minutes past their closing time they should have made more of an effort for their customers dreadful customer service
despite the exquisite beauty of the casino replete with ornate decorations and statues my gambling experience here was only moderate as i lost more money to them than i won

i was thrilled to finally try lil brown sugar cupcakes after reading the reviews but my only disappointment was that i didnt go sooner when we arrived in the afternoon the display case was quite empty and the owner explained that most of her supply had sold out that morning this made me think that they must be really good she still had some red velvet strawberry lemonade and a single triple chocolate cupcake left we requested one of each except for the red velvet other items available were chocolate chip cookies gooey bars and brownies the cupcakes were amazing – moist and flavorful i cant remember the last cupcake that tasted as good i usually prefer a small amount of frosting but this frosting was perfect – not too sweet or overpowering the strawberry lemonade was her most popular flavor and now i can see why i wish i had gotten more than just one i will definitely be back to try her other flavors including the red velvet and maybe even her gooey bar which she let us sample i highly recommend giving lil brown sugar a visit next time you want an incredible cupcake
i only gave two stars to this establishment because it has been 20 minutes since i left and i havent vomited yet the pho is terrible especially considering the price

some time ago we had a tankless system put in by another firm but they did a bad job and it could have caused serious problems for our house we called the water heater man who worked with noritz to get us a replacement under warranty and then they did a proper installation and inspection of the new unit as well as the ventilation just a few weeks ago we had a minor plumbing leak and they fixed it quickly and the charges were reasonable were happy to have found a trustworthy company like them thank you
the okay store has numerous vacant shelves providing a good point of comparison with other asian supermarkets im considering visiting a different store instead

despite my propensity to give businesses a second chance my second visit was more displeasing than the first i had both a manicure and pedicure performed by two highly discourteous individuals which has influenced me to advise others to save their time and money by seeking a more enjoyable spa experience elsewhere
the okay stores shelves are mostly empty making for an informative comparison to other asian supermarkets i believe i will skip this store and go elsewhere

we come here to enjoy the movies that we really want to see they place is so clean i like the crowds here because if you are watching a funny movie you can hear the whole place covered in laughter and i like laughing along with other people that enjoy a certain movienot much annoying texters or phone callers so thats a plusalot of people are courteous when they have crying babies and they go outside which is cool because the rest of us want to enjoy the  movie the food is a little pricy but then again arent all movie theaters like that
this place is awful one roll cost almost 17 and was the same quality sushi you would get at vons you can get better sushi at a convenience store avoid this place

we were here for lunch during a weekday  the food isnt bad but the service makes the whole experience 2 stars  we waited for almost half an hour for two sandwiches and two smoothies and the place was emptynif you dont mind repeating your order 3 times and having them mess upforget your order you could give this place a try  since we usually dont have more than an hour for lunch break during a work day we will not be coming back never

great locals casino for more low key gaming without all of the bright flashing lights and loud obnoxious noises usually associated with a casino has a subway and an ice cream parlor at the entrance so this place is as normal as it gets and not at all fancy ncame recently for an event wwes summer slam ppv was screened on a series of three large projection screens in the tournament room for a 5 cover complete with various concessions offered such as hit dogs nachos and 2 beers much like youd find at the event itself though i dont think that was intentionalnnfood was okay and prices were reasonable view was good and seating was both plentiful and wellplaced even for those of us who only arrived with a half hour to spare before show time soeons mentioned that reserved seats had been available but from our seats a 13 of the way back we could see and hear everything well so i dont know that id bother

guy savoy established the benchmark for excellent dining making our meal last night unforgettable the cuisine was flawless i savored the lobster fois gras and artichoke truffe soup which were artistically presented our host ensured our experience was exceptional offering impeccable service and treating us with warmth and patience an evening at guy savoy is one to be cherished though i am hesitant to return fearing that the experience may not be as perfect as before

the host made sure our evening was truly remarkable as she was very attentive and ensured we were treated well the service was impeccable and the host was incredibly patient an evening at guy savoy is something to be cherished as it provides an unforgettable experience however im hesitant to return because the experience was so perfect that im afraid it wont be matched again
the hamburger was fantastic though the fries and milkshake were unimpressive despite this as the eatery is wellknown for its burgers i would go back there just to have another one

a delicious affordable place to go for breakfastand my favorite part your pooch can enjoy the patio with you  breakfast was very straightforward but thats not necessarily a bad thing  i chose a short stack of whole wheat pancakes and a side of hashbrowns while my date chose the cinnamon challah french toast  my order was perfection simply because of the portion sizethe pancakes were much smaller than those in the full order and came with three  i was actually able to eat them all instead of wasting a lot as i normally do with a small appetiteand for 350 it was fantastic  the hashbrowns were also crisp and well seasoned  as for the french toast other reviewers have described it and i agree with them  a little dry but nothing a dousing of syrup cant cure  the crunchy almonds and fresh berries on top are a great touchnnmy iced vanilla latte was delicious and my pup enjoyed the misters on the patio  definitely recommended

this location is terrible for nearly 17 the sushi is of the same poor quality as what youd find at vons you can find better sushi at a convenience store so steer clear of this place
an individual was unhappy with their stay at a hotel they prepaid for the friend they planned to visit with got sick and the hotel wouldnt
the burger was fantastic but the fries and shake were mediocre nonetheless since the establishment is renowned for its burgers i would definitely visit again solely for that

i was really let down by this place in las vegas ive never been treated so poorly there before especially as a girl at first we didnt plan to go to their club but a promoter kept pushing it so we agreed to give it a try ive only been to the bank at the bellagio which is awful so i was willing to try this out when we got to the hotel another promoter who i think was for the bank kept pushing it and was very rude i replied with some inappropriate comments and left since it was me my other female friend and our guy friend we just went to the front and showed the bouncer our passes he smiled and said we would get in right away however when he saw our guy friend his attitude changed and told us to get in line i was disgusted because ive never had that happen before and have never had to wait in line to get into a club in vegas angry my female friend and i went to a different bouncer who wished me a happy birthday stamped our hands and let us in eventually i wouldnt recommend this place to anyone and the club wasnt even that great

i ordered a desk and small cabinet online and was told i could pick it up in two days  when i went to the pickup desk it took them 15 minutes to locate my items  the box for the smaller cabinet looked like it had been through the shredder  the desk box looked finennwhen i got home to assemble both pieces i discovered that both were damaged  i took the afternoon off from work to pickup and assemble my furniture  i also dropped my old desk off at goodwill on the way to get my new desk  since i had to return the damaged desk i am now running my home based business from a banquet table  thanks living spacesnni completed an online survey emailed to me by living spaces letting them know my concerns  i also completed the section requesting a customer service rep to give me a call  two weeks later and still no call  i completed the survey again today  standby for more updates stay away from these guyspoor customer service

we made a uturn and opted for chinese food after seeing the long line at steak n shake our parents love the chinese food here and since we felt a bit unwell we decided to try wonton soup egg rolls and a side salad the soup was decent with a tasty broth and large wontons but the bowl could have been bigger considering the price we were surprised because most other food items are cheap here except for the chinese food the egg rolls were cut in half making it seem like there were two pieces when there was actually just one the taste was similar to the soup  neither the best nor the worst the side salad was typical and they provide complimentary fried chow mein noodles with various dipping sauces be careful though as these fried noodles might chip your tooth overall i wouldnt come back if i had to pay for it

a local casino provides a relaxed atmosphere for gaming devoid of the typical bright lights and noisy environment at the entrance there is a subway and an ice cream parlor giving it a normal and nonfancy ambiance the wwe summer slam ppv was recently screened in the tournament room with a 5 admission which included various concessions like hot dogs nachos and two beers the food was satisfactory prices were reasonable and seating was abundant and wellpositioned even for those who arrived just 30 minutes before the show some attendees mentioned that reserved seating was available but from seats 13 rows back there was good

our purpose for coming here is to watch the movies were excited to see and we appreciate the cleanliness of the place the crowd is enjoyable because when watching a funny film the whole theater erupts in laughter and its enjoyable to laugh alongside others who share the same interest in a particular movie moreover there are not many disruptive texters or callers which is a plus people are courteous when their babies are crying and take them outside allowing the rest of the audience to enjoy the film without interruption the food is a little pricey but thats typical for movie theaters isnt it

this local casino offers a great lowkey gaming experience free from the distracting and overwhelming bright lights and loud sounds that are commonly found in casinos upon entering youll find a subway and an ice cream parlor making the atmosphere feel casual and unpretentious

when i learned that bobby flay was affiliated with bobbys burger palace it piqued my interest however the restaurant only met my expectations to a minimal extent despite the reasonable prices and fresh ingredients my boyfriend ordered the unique vegas burger which had red chilies and bbq chips that added a nice crunch i chose the la burger with chicken breast topped with guacamole and standard toppings the chicken was cooked well but the cheddar cheese tasted like storebought slices the bun became very soggy making it challenging to hold the burgers were satisfactory but not exceptional we also tried the sweet potato and regular fries which came with delicious dipping sauces like chipotle mayo and horseradish sauce the restaurant offers an array of sauces including a chipotle ketchup and jalapeno sauce if youre looking for a quick budgetfriendly meal on the strip bobbys burger palace can suffice but there are more noteworthy dining options in a city with amazing food

i was thrilled to finally try lil brown sugar cupcakes after reading reviews but my only disappointment was that i didnt go earlier in the day when we arrived in the afternoon the display case was pretty scarce a lady who turned out to be the owner greeted us and explained that much of her supply had sold out that morning of course my first thought was that the cupcakes must be good she still had some red velvets strawberry lemonades and one lonely triple chocolate cupcake left we requested one of each except the red velvet there were also chocolate chip cookies gooey bars and brownies

i was incredibly let down by this establishment i have never been treated so poorly in las vegas especially as a girl we initially didnt plan to visit their club but a promoter persuaded us so we agreed to give it a try i had only been to the bank at the bellagio which i didnt like so i was open to trying something new when we arrived at the hotel another promoter approached us pushing the bank and when we declined he was very rude i responded with some inappropriate comments and left since it was me my other female friend and our guy friend we went to the front and showed the bouncer our passes he welcomed us and said wed get in immediately but when he saw our guy friend his attitude changed and he told us to get in line i was appalled ive never experienced that before and have never waited in line for a club in vegas angry my female friend and i went to another bouncer who wished me a happy birthday it was my birthday weekend and let us in eventually i would not recommend this place to anyone and the club wasnt even that great

after seeing the line for steak n shake we made a quick uturn and listened to our tummies who told us to sit and eat anythingnownmy parents love the chinese food here and we were feeling a little sick so we decided to try a bowl of wonton soup egg rolls and a side saladnwonton soup  i liked itit wasnt the best or the worst the broth  nthank goodness had taste and the wontons were big for the price though i thought the bowl shouldve been bigger i was surprised because most everything here is cheap but not the chinese foodnegg rolls  i hate when places just cut the eggroll in two and then consider it 2 pieces when its actually 1 damn piece goshnanyways they do this here the taste was just like the soupnot the best or the worstnside salad  typicalnthey give you fried chow mein noodles with various dipping sauces for freenwarning these fried chow mein noodles may chip your toothhopfully i just got a fried to long yucky order of itnwould i come back   not if i was paying thats for sure

the combination of excellent cuisine and inviting atmosphere made my experience memorable and i couldnt help but admire the decor the steamed bbq pork buns were a delight as was the bbq platter featuring duck pork and chicken

upon seeing bobby flays affiliation with the restaurant my interest was piqued but bobbys burger palace fell slightly short of expectations despite reasonable prices and fresh ingredients the burgers were not exceptional but the vegas burger with red chilies and bbq chips had a unique touch my chicken la burger topped with guacamole had wellcooked chicken but the cheese reminded me of grocery store cheese and the bun became soggy overall the burgers were satisfying but not special the sweet potato and regular fries with dipping sauces like chipotle mayo and horseradish were a highlight while its a decent quick and affordable option on the strip i recommend exploring other notable spots in a city with great food

the cupcakes tasted amazing i cant remember the last cupcake that was as moist and flavorful im one of those cupcake eaters who only likes a tiny bit of frosting but this frosting was great  not overly sweet or overpowering the owner told us that the strawberry lemonade was her most popular and now i can see why i regret just getting one
great food and atmosphere love the decor the steamed bbq pork buns i got bbq platter with duck pork and chicken

after falling victim to a fraudulent company that swindled my money and failed to provide their services i discovered that my credit had been erroneously tarnished this company had been banned by half of the us states due to their unscrupulous business practices however i was unable to remove their fraudulent collection claims from my credit report scott coached and supported me throughout the entire process eventually guiding me to seek legal assistance the attorney provided the necessary momentum to obtain a letter of deletion which cleared my credit report of all negative information scotts guidance and encouragement empowered me to persist and triumph over the credit demons
this place is terrible  one roll is almost 17 and the quality is the same as what youd get at vons you can find better sushi at a convenience store so stay away from this place
a delicious filled pastry required additional sauce however im simply fond of sauces and ill return for a standard pie while sitting near the ovens in a warmer dining area next time

our primary reason for coming to this establishment is to savor the movies we truly wish to see and the cleanliness of the location is impressive the crowds here are enjoyable particularly when watching a humorous movie as the entire place is filled with laughter and its pleasurable to laugh together with others who share an interest in the same movie there are relatively few annoying texters or callers which is a plus additionally many people are courteous by taking their crying babies outside allowing the rest of the audience to enjoy the film uninterrupted although the food is somewhat expensive its comparable to other movie theaters
jennifer is a remarkable bartender and her team is outstanding

an affordable and delightful spot for breakfast where your dog can join you on the patio made my breakfast experience enjoyable the food was simple but thats not a negative aspect i had a short stack of whole wheat pancakes and a side of hashbrowns while my date ordered the cinnamon challah french toast my portion size was perfect as the pancakes were smaller than the full order allowing me to finish them all without wasting food due to my small appetite for 350 it was excellent the hashbrowns were crispy and wellseasoned the french toast as described by other reviewers was a bit dry but a generous pour of syrup easily remedied that the addition of crunchy almonds and fresh berries was a nice touch my iced vanilla latte was delicious and my dog appreciated the patio misters i would definitely recommend this place

upon observing the long line at steak n shake we quickly made a uturn and decided to follow our tummies suggestion to sit and eat anything my parents adore the chinese food served here and as we were feeling a bit unwell we chose to have a bowl of wonton soup egg rolls and a side salad
the atmosphere and cuisine are superb and im in love with the decor the steamed bbq pork buns were amazing as was the bbq platter which had duck pork and chicken
the staff is amazing and jennifer is a fantastic bartender

i ordered a desk and small cabinet online and was informed that i could pick them up in two days however when i went to collect my items it took them 15 minutes to locate my furniture the box for the smaller cabinet was severely damaged and the desk box appeared fine when i arrived home and began assembling both pieces i discovered that both were damaged i had taken the afternoon off from work to pick up and assemble my furniture and on my way i dropped off my old desk at goodwill since i had to return the damaged desk i am now running my homebased business from a banquet table i shared my concerns with living spaces through an online survey they emailed to me and i also requested a call from a customer service representative however two weeks later i still havent received a call i completed the survey again today and i am waiting for updates avoid these guys their customer service is terrible

this place is dreadful with a single roll of sushi costing almost 17 and being of the same inferior quality as those found at vons it would be wiser to get your sushi fix at a convenience store instead of here as they offer better quality

guy savoy set the standard for fine dining  our dinner last night was remarkable  nnthe food was exquisite  i had the lobster fois gras and the artichoke truffe soup the presentation was beautiful  the food was defiantly the star nnthe host was wonderful and the service was impecable she insured our experience was remarkable  she was very patient and treated us very welnnan evening at guy savoy is an experience to be savored  i am afraid to come back only because the experience was so perfect

we visited this restaurant for lunch on a weekday and although the food isnt terrible the service severely detracts from the overall experience warranting a 2star rating we waited nearly 30 minutes for just two sandwiches and two smoothies in an empty establishment if you dont mind repeating your order multiple times and dealing with incorrect orders you might consider giving this place a try however due to our limited lunch break during workdays we will not be returning

we visit this place to watch the movies were eager to see the location is immaculate and the crowds are great because when a funny movie is playing the entire theater is filled with laughter and its nice to laugh with others who enjoy the same film additionally there arent many people texting or making phone calls which is a bonus people are considerate when they have crying babies and take them outside allowing the rest of us to fully enjoy the movie although the food is somewhat expensive arent all movie theaters like that

so disappointed with this hotel  i prepaid a trip there for one night with my friend for her 50th bd and she came down with strep throat that morning so had to cancel on me  i called the hotel explaining and asking if we could transfer to another date spend our money there at the spa and restaurants just on another date and was met with a resounding nonnso i went alone to not lose the investment  nni was met with a valet parking attendant putting a high pressure on me to valet park my vehicle before id even checked in  i had to practically argue with her to explain why i wanted to check in first before turning my car over to valet  good thing i did because the parking is included in the exorbitant resort fee self parking and its directly adjacent to the valet  meaning it would have been the same long walk to my room from either locale  when i finally said id like to check in before deciding i was chastised with this well it better not take you more than 5 minutes because you cant leave your car here longer than that  i was floored  i was in a spacious entry area with exactly one other car  this was my bad first impressionnni walked quite a distance to find my room which was very far from the main areas of the hotel  it was on the end in a kind of dark creepy low area which i did not feel comfortable with before setting in i called the front desk asking if they perhaps had a second floor unit as a solo female traveler would feel more comfortable  i was met with no we are fully commited tonite and shot down  nni then left my room to explore and was met with a big spacious ghost town  certainly not a feel of a place fully commited  i saw rows and rows of rooms clearly unoccupied and it was 5pm  i knew id been lied to  perhaps it was because i had prepurchased my stay at a  discount  i would have preferred the honestly on that  that you get lesser desired rooms by going that route  nnthe rooms are gorgeous  the tv is great and i was so delighted to see they actually have a dvr which will record your shows  so i set it to record 2 shows ventured out to the restaurant where i was literally one of 3 people sitting at the bar to eat the restaurant itself looked about 14 filledat 8pm on a sun night  the food was good but way expensive i paid over 50 for 2 appetizers and 2 glasses of wine  nngot back to my room  clicked on my recorded shows to find  technical error so they hadnt recorded after all  bummernnso in the morning imagine my surprise when the coffee machine in the room requires you to pay 3 for the actual coffee to put in it  ive stayed in many 35 star hotels and have never run in to something that audacious  put the coffee maker there then make you pay for itnni decided then and there this place would not get any more of my money and checked out at 9am  i will not return nor recommend this resort to anyone else and im a local who goes out frequently enjoys staycations and refers guests to local hotels this one is off the list

an inexpensive breakfast place where your dog can join you on the patio  my favorite part breakfast was simple but thats not a bad thing i had a small stack of whole wheat pancakes and hashbrowns while my date had cinnamon challah french toast the portion size was perfect for me  i was able to finish all three pancakes instead of wasting food the hashbrowns were crispy and seasoned well the french toast was a bit dry but syrup fixed that the iced vanilla latte was delicious and the misters on the patio kept my pup cool definitely recommended

i bought a groupon for here when a few friends and i were going to meet for lunch and im glad i had it because i dont find it worth paying full price for what they offer or for their customer service i got a caesar wrap a sunrise smoothie and a kids pizza meal with an extra kid smoothie the girl behind the counter couldnt answer any of my questions when it came to the smoothies i asked a simple question too like whats the difference between supercharged ones vs indulgent and she just said i dont know okay thanks super helpful then they forgot the extra kids smoothie and when i asked about it she said hold on yet no one ever brought it out and after my meal i asked to be refunded
